subject: Basketball
Asian-Americans
lead_paragraph: In his 18 months in the N.B.A., Jeremy Lin has been an unheralded prospect, a hometown sensation and a scrutinized ethnic symbol. Now he wants to show he can be a valuable player.
snippet: In his 18 months in the N.B.A., Jeremy Lin has been an unheralded prospect, a hometown sensation and a scrutinized ethnic symbol. Now he wants to show he can be a valuable player.
